name: Drag and Dread
description:
Drag dice to any onscreen number to change the value by number rolled - all stats and actions can be changed

Will you decrease your panic or focus on maintaining enough ammo for the next encounter? Should you increase health or shoot down the approaching enemy?

Press Go to start the next turn

Increase your high score by killing enemies and advancing through the dungeon 

Made for Mini Jam 83: Dread using Godot

Known bugs: game does not load in Firefox
